item.title: My ::givepvp command don't work
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

Code :

        if(command.startsWith("givepvp") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")) {

String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.pkpoints += 100;
c.sM(“You recieve 100 points. Use them wisely.”);
c.sM(“Your PVP Points Are: “+ c.pkpoints +”!”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

When I try to use this it just goes straight to "this player is either not online or doesnt exist.
Any one know what is wrong?

Read full topic
